description:
As a beta LPA Planning Officer
  I want to upload the plans which were used to reach the LPA decision
  So that they can form part of the evidence on which the Inspector makes a decision
name: Upload the plans used to reach the LPA decision

elements.name: AC1 LPA Planning Officer navigates to 'Upload the plans used to reach the decision' question

steps.name: an appeal has been created
a questionnaire has been created
the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
a LPA Planning Officer is reviewing their LPA Questionnaire task list
LPA Planning Officer chooses to upload plans used to reach the decision
LPA Planning Officer is presented with the ability to upload plans

elements.name: AC2 LPA Planning Officer successfully uploads file via upload button

steps.name: an appeal has been created
a questionnaire has been created
the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
Upload the plans used to reach the decision question is requested
valid file 'upload-file-valid.tiff' is successfully uploaded for 'decisionPlans'
progress is made to the task list
Upload the plans used to reach the decision subsection is shown as completed

elements.name: AC2 LPA Planning Officer successfully uploads file via upload button

elements.name: AC4 LPA Planning Officer successfully uploads multiple files

a questionnaire has been created
the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
Upload the plans used to reach the decision question is requested

progress is made to the task list
Upload the plans used to reach the decision subsection is shown as completed

elements.name: AC5 LPA Planning Officer does not upload a file and is provided with an error.

steps.name: an appeal has been created
a questionnaire has been created
the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
Upload the plans used to reach the decision question is requested
no file has been uploaded
progress is halted with a message to 'Upload plans used to reach the decision'

elements.name: AC6 LPA Planning Officer selects invalid file size

steps.name: an appeal has been created
a questionnaire has been created
the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
Upload the plans used to reach the decision question is requested
invalid files 'upload_file_large.tiff' have been selected for 'decisionPlans'
progress is halted with a message the file 'upload_file_large.tiff' 'is too big'

elements.name: AC7 LPA Planning Officer selects Invalid file format

steps.name: an appeal has been created
a questionnaire has been created
the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
Upload the plans used to reach the decision question is requested
invalid files 'upload-file-invalid-wrong-type.csv' have been selected for 'decisionPlans'
progress is halted with a message the file 'upload-file-invalid-wrong-type.csv' 'format is incorrect'

elements.name: AC8 LPA Planning Officer selects to return to previous page

steps.name: an appeal has been created
a questionnaire has been created
the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
Upload the plans used to reach the decision question is requested
Back is then requested
the LPA Planning Officer is taken to the Task List

elements.name: AC9  LPA Planning Officer deletes a file prior to save and continue

steps.name: an appeal has been created
a questionnaire has been created
the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
a file has been uploaded for 'decisionPlans'
LPA Planning Officer deletes the file
the file is removed

elements.name: AC10  LPA Planning Officer deletes a file after save and continue

steps.name: an appeal has been created
a questionnaire has been created
the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
a file has been uploaded and confirmed for 'decisionPlans'
Upload the plans used to reach the decision question is requested
LPA Planning Officer deletes the file
the file is removed

elements.name: AC11 LPA Planning Officer returns to the completed Upload the plans used to reach the decision question

steps.name: an appeal has been created
a questionnaire has been created
the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
The question 'Upload the plans used to reach the decision' has been completed for 'decisionPlans'
the plans used to reach the decision question is requested
the information they previously entered is still populated

elements.name: AC12 Appeal details side panel

steps.name: an appeal has been created
a questionnaire has been created
the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
Upload the plans used to reach the decision question is requested
the appeal details panel is displayed on the right hand side of the page

elements.name: AC13 JavaScript Disabled

steps.name: an appeal has been created
a questionnaire has been created
the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
Upload the plans used to reach the decision question is requested
valid file 'upload-file-valid.tiff' is successfully uploaded for 'decisionPlans'
progress is made to the task list
Upload the plans used to reach the decision subsection is shown as completed

elements.name: AC14 Change answers

steps.name: an appeal has been created
a questionnaire has been created
the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
a change to answer 'Upload Plans' is requested from Change your answers page
an answer is saved for 'decisionPlans'
progress is made to the Check Your Answers page
the updated answer is displayed
